metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0918 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in the 389 Directory Server that allows anunauthenticated attacker with network access to the LDAP port to cause adenial of service. The denial of service is triggered by a single messagesent over a TCP connection, no bind or other authentication is required.The message triggers a segmentation fault that results in slapd crashing.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
